code: import{makeStyles}from"@mui/styles";export function RandomGradiant(){var color1=[Math.round(Math.random()*255),Math.round(Math.random()*255),Math.round(Math.random()*255)];var opacity1=Number(Number(Math.random()).toFixed(1));var color2=[Math.round(Math.random()*255),Math.round(Math.random()*255),Math.round(Math.random()*255)];var opacity2=Number(Number(Math.random()).toFixed(1));var gradiantText="linear-gradient( 270deg , ";color1.forEach(function(value,index){if(index==0){gradiantText+="rgb( "+value+" , ";}else if(index==2){gradiantText+=" "+value+" , "+opacity1+" ) ";}else{gradiantText+=" "+value+" , ";}});gradiantText+=" , ";color2.forEach(function(value,index){if(index==0){gradiantText+="rgb( "+value+" , ";}else if(index==2){gradiantText+=" "+value+" , "+opacity2+" ) ";}else{gradiantText+=" "+value+" , ";}});gradiantText+=" ) ";return gradiantText;}var useStyles=makeStyles({SkillsContainer:{display:'flex',justifyContent:"center",padding:'15px',boxShadow:'0px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)'},percentage:{backgroundColor:'white',height:'25px'},randomGradiant:{height:'25px'}});export default useStyles;
